texts.name: Sierra
texts.biography: Sierra believes that strength lies in alliances between each individual. She is known to travel from battlefields, tirelessly seeking out allies to join the cause. Her charismatic presence inspires others to embrace her kingdom, uniting diverse individuals under the banner of hope and unity.
